festival.introText:
We proudly present the next chapter of the Tidy Weekenders; Tidyland 2023!
 
In 2022 Tidyland Weekender reignited and redefined the 'Weekender' experience - many people hailed the event as 'the best Weekender ever'. With a summertime setting, outdoor stages, the biggest line up to have ever been hosted at a Weekender and a 3 year build up, it will go down in history as one of Tidy's biggest & best parties.
 
There was an overwhelming call to throw another 72 hours off from the world and somehow pull off the feat topping this year's event. After much deliberation and consideration, the next chapter of Tidyland is set to head to Pontins Holiday Centre, Southport for the next summertime seaside adventure!
 
Southport is synonymous with 'Weekender' events. The venues are able to offer a new dynamic to the Tidyland experience (more arenas, bigger production and easier accessibility for travellers and day passes), so this is bound to make 2023 an even bigger and even better Tidyland party.
 
The Tidyland Weekender is all about peace, love, unity and having fun with your chosen family. Set against the backdrop of banging music supplied by the world's best artists, get yourself to sunny Southport this summer for 3 days and 3 nights of Tidy magic!
festival.location: Pontins Southport Holiday Park in Southport

reviews.title: Review of The 'Tidyland' Tidy Weekender Festival

faqs.question: When is The Tidyland Weekender 2023?
faqs.answer: The Tidyland Weekender takes place from Friday 7th to Monday 10th July 2023.

faqs.question: How to get to The Tidyland Weekender
faqs.answer:
Venue address: Pontins Southport Holiday Park. Shore Rd, Southport PR8 2PZ

By Car: We recommend you plan your travel to the event via Googlemaps, https:// www.google.com/maps

By Train: There is a local Train Station in Southport located approximately 10 minutes drive from Pontins. We recommend you use https://www.thetrainline.com/ or https:// www.nationalrail.co.uk/to plan your travel.

The nearest Airports to Southport are https://www.liverpoolairport.com/ or https:// www.manchesterairport.co.uk/. Various trains run indirectly to Southport from both these airports. Please see the above train provider websites for more details.

faqs.question: Is there any camping at The Tidyland Weekender?
faqs.answer: No, but it takes place at Pontins Holiday Resort so there will be chalets available.

faqs.question: Ticket info for The Tidyland Weekender 2023
faqs.answer:
All tickets for the Tidyland Weekender are purchased via SKIDDLE. The Tidy Weekender runs an e Ticket system so all ticketing and group organisation is fully electronic. No printed tickets will be posted out. Each individual ticketholder will be given a unique QR code which will be checked on entrance. You need to be 18 years or over to attend. EVERYONE MUST PRESENT VALID ID THAT MATCHES THE CORRESPONDING NAME REGISTERED IN THEIR WEEKENDER ACCOUNT UPON ARRIVAL. To avoid issues with mobile phone coverage please makes sure your Ticket & QR code is already downloaded and saved to your phone or device. Alternatively bring a print out of your e Ticket QR code.

For further information on ticketing, please visit SKIDDLE here: https://help.skiddle.com/en/

faqs.question: Principle Bookers
faqs.answer: All chalets will have a principle booker / group leader, who is responsible for the booking and the chalet for the entire duration of your stay at the event. It's their responsibility to make sure the booking info is complete. The principle booker is the only point of contact for any questions, queries or issues needed to be raised regarding the booking. If you need to change the principle booker's details, please contact the SKIDDLE customer support team here: https://help.skiddle.com/en/

faqs.question: Where is The Tidyland Weekender?
faqs.answer: The Tidyland Weekender is held at Pontins Southport Holiday Resort, Southport.

faqs.question: Chalets
faqs.answer:
All chalets are self-catering and include a lounge with TV, kitchen with cooker and cooking/ dining utensils, a bathroom with either a shower or bath plus a sink and toilet.

The size of the chalet will depend on the berth size as will the number of beds / bedrooms. Most of the chalets include a double sofa bed in the lounge which counts as 2 of the total beds. The rest of the beds will be singles.

There are 2 types of chalet class - VIP and classic. VIP a feature free electric and a patio door. Classic chalets require electricity cards available from reception at £5 each. Pontins only provide duvets and pillows but no linen (bed sheets, pillow cases, duvet covers). Linen is charged for by the holiday park so we recommend bringing your own if possible. The holiday park charges £5 for a single linen pack and £8 for a double linen pack. The park also don't provide towels so please bring your own if possible although you can buy towels from the park.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent. Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: What's the line up and running times for The Tidyland Weekender?
faqs.answer: The DJ line up will be announced shortly. Open arrival to the event you will be issued with an event lanyard that will include all the running times and set times for the full weekends entertainment program.

faqs.question: I have booked a room but want to upgrade / downgrade. Is this possible?
faqs.answer: Yes - please contact us at https://www.skiddle.com/contact/

faqs.question: I want to book but I can't afford it - can you help?
faqs.answer: Yes we can. All you need to do is place a minimum booking of £50 (+ £5 Booking Fee) deposit per person in your apartment to confirm that they are going. The rest of the ticket money can then be split over month payments through until May 2023. For more details on the payment plans go to: https://help.skiddle.com/en/collections/2982905-paymentplan

faqs.question: Does my ticket include accommodation AND access to all venues & entertainment across the weekend?
faqs.answer: All chalet tickets include all accommodation & venue access. Day passes just include venue access.

faqs.question: I have booked a room but want to upgrade / downgrade. Is this possible?
faqs.answer: Yes - please contact us at https://www.skiddle.com/contact/

faqs.question: When will a receive my tickets for The Tidyland Weekender?
faqs.answer: You will not receive a physical ticket, but you will receive a digital ticket via email from SKIDDLE. You will need to bring this to the event along with a form of ID (passport, driving license etc)

faqs.question: Will I be charged for any damages to my chalet?
faqs.answer:
Yes, there will be a damage waiver form in every chalet and given to one to the principal booker upon check in. It is essential that you check all items listed on the form and report any damage as soon as you can.

All chalets will be checked on the Monday afternoon with a member of Pontin's staff.

faqs.question: Can I pay - then get my friends to pay separately?
faqs.answer: Sorry, no. One person has to be responsible for making the payment for each booking (the minimum being two in a party). It's just like going on holiday, one person has to take responsibility for either collecting and paying the deposit, or collecting all the money and paying in full.

faqs.question: Will I be charged for any damages to my chalet?
faqs.answer:
Yes, there will be a damage waiver form in every chalet and given to one to the principal booker upon check in. It is essential that you check all items listed on the form and report any damage as soon as you can.

All chalets will be checked on the Monday afternoon with a member of Pontin's staff.

faqs.question: Is there a Thursday night at The Tidyland Weekender this year?
faqs.answer: Yes! If you book and pay in full before 30th September you get this additional night for free. Tickets for the Thursday go on sale 01st October and are priced at £35 per person.

faqs.question: What time does check-in begin at The Tidyland Weekender?
faqs.answer: Doors open for main check in 12 Noon on Friday 7th July 2023. Please note - if you are coming on the Thursday night you will be emailed specific details.

faqs.question: What time does The Tidyland Weekender officially close?
faqs.answer: Everyone will be expected to leave the site by 10am Monday 10th July 2023 Should you want to check out early than this is possible. Please advise main reception and hand your keys back in.
